MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY21 postcode area of Welshpool, affecting properties in Berriew and surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of adverse weather conditions. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:11PM on 1st November 2020.
